descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 15 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
# Archer & Guardians — VR Tower Defense × Archery

Draw your bow, command your animal army, and stop the monster horde!

# Why You’ll Love It
- **True VR Archery** – Native Quest controls let you nock, draw, and loose with satisfying haptics.  
- **Full-Scale Tower Defense** – Place Warriors, Mages, Healers, and giant Ballistae, then upgrade them mid-battle.  
- **Monster Variety** – Fire-breathing Dragons and spell-casting mages that hurl volleys—or even summon reinforcements—will stop at nothing to breach your gate.
- **Minimal motion sickness**: no stick locomotion—every view change comes from your own head- and body-movement.
- **Family-Friendly Fantasy** – Colorful visuals, no gore.

# Early-Access Roadmap

- **May 2025**: New stages and unit upgrades
- **June 2025**: *Castle Defense* mode — protect the king inside a trap-laden, gimmick-packed fortress
- **Later** : Additional game mode(s) to be announced


We’re actively expanding the game—leave a store review with your feedback and help shape its future!
